attributes.action: stop the Crown symbol on beer glasses being scrapped.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The familiar Crown symbol is set to disappear from pint and half pint glasses, replaced by a European Union-wide "CE" mark instead.

The EU's Measuring Instruments Directive came into force last October and requires the UK to phase out the Crown in favour of the Conformite Europeenne logo. 

We think the Crown should be allowed to remain on glasses alongside the EU symbol. Use your vote today!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
